host.description: server host ip, defaults to env variable

port.description: server host port, defaults to env variable

table.description: name of the table to watch in the current database

connect_timeout.description: amount of time to wait to connect before dropping

database_name.description: name of database on the server

List server databases.description: List all databases on the current connected server

Reconnect to server.description: Reconnects to the last connected RethinkDB server

List database tables.description: List all tables in the current database

Get server info.description: Gets information about the current connected RethinkDB server

filters.description: control which documents are matched and updated based on these strings

port.description: server host port, defaults to env variable

connect_timeout.description: amount of time to wait to connect before dropping

host.description: server host ip, defaults to env variable

table.description: name of the table to watch in the current database

database_name.description: name of database on the server

List server databases.description: List all databases on the current connected server

Reconnect to server.description: Reconnects to the last connected RethinkDB server

List database tables.description: List all tables in the current database

Get server info.description: Gets information about the current connected RethinkDB server

nio/RethinkDBUpdate.Output:
The result of the update request to the server.
sample signal:
```
{
'errors': 0,
'unchanged': 0,
'inserted': 0,
'skipped': 0,
'deleted': 0,
'replaced': 1
}
```
nio/RethinkDBUpdate.Input:
Any list of signals. This block expects incoming signals to have attributes
that are matched with filters and will exist in the table.
